Referee Ahmed Al Kaf issued three yellow cards in the match, one for Bahrain and two for Indonesia
Al Kaf fouled Indonesia 27 times, one of which led to a free kick that gave Bahrain the lead in the 15th minute
Incidents such as the 2019 Japan vs Qatar AFC Asian Cup final and the 2018 Australia vs Iraq World Cup qualifier serve as precedents.
The controversy highlights broader concerns about officiating when Middle Eastern referees oversee matches involving non-Middle Eastern teams.
Teams from Japan, Australia, and South Korea have expressed similar frustrations in past matches, where they perceived referees from the region as favoring Middle Eastern teams.
